attributes.action: Change the law on cannabis for medical and recreational use in the uk
attributes.additional_details:
Street dealing will decrease
less police officers needed to task the operations. 
an estimated 3.2 billion per year generated into the economy.
21+ rule implied to obtain cannabis
medical card required for patients with illness. 
New Id card for the purchase of recreational cannabis.
attributes.background: The people's fight for the change of law in the UK has been sought after for years to decriminalize medical use and recreational use of cannabis. The government has to think outside the box and see it's what our people want and what the economy needs in the wake of brexit.
